tns:patch.author: Dolghier Constantin
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_ni_donor_funding CASCADE; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_ni_donor_funding AS SELECT f.amp_activity_id, f.amp_funding_id as funding_id, fd.amp_fund_detail_id, fd.transaction_type, fd.adjustment_type, fd.transaction_date, fd.transaction_amount, fd.pledge_id as related_pledge_id, fd.amp_currency_id AS currency_id, f.type_of_assistance_category_va AS terms_assist_id, fd.fixed_exchange_rate, f.financing_instr_category_value AS financing_instrument_id, f.amp_donor_org_id AS donor_org_id, f.mode_of_payment_category_va AS mode_of_payment_id, f.funding_status_category_va AS funding_status_id, fd.capital_spend_percent, f.agreement AS agreement_id, CASE WHEN fd.disaster_response IS TRUE THEN 1 WHEN fd.disaster_response IS FALSE THEN 2 ELSE NULL END AS disaster_response_code, fd.recipient_org_id AS recipient_org_id, fd.recipient_role_id AS recipient_role_id, f.source_role_id AS source_role_id, fd.expenditure_class AS expenditure_class_id, f.concessionality_level_va AS concessionality_level_id FROM amp_funding f JOIN amp_funding_detail fd ON fd.amp_funding_id = f.amp_funding_id
UNION ALL
SELECT apb.amp_activity_id, apb.amp_annual_project_budget_id AS funding_id, apb.amp_annual_project_budget_id AS amp_fund_detail_id, 15 AS transaction_type, (SELECT acv.id from amp_category_value acv JOIN amp_category_class acc ON acv.amp_category_class_id = acc.id WHERE acc.keyname='adjustment_type' and acv.category_value='Actual') AS adjustment_type, apb.year AS transaction_date, apb.amount AS transaction_amount, NULL as related_pledge_id, apb.amp_currency_id AS currency_id, NULL as terms_assist_id, NULL as fixed_exchange_rate, NULL as financing_instrument_id, NULL as donor_org_id, NULL AS mode_of_payment_id, NULL as funding_status_id, NULL as capital_spend_percent, NULL as agreement_id, NULL AS disaster_response, NULL as recipient_org_id, NULL as recipient_role_id, (SELECT amp_role_id FROM amp_role WHERE role_code='DN'), NULL as expenditure_class_id, NULL as concessionality_level_id FROM amp_annual_project_budget apb
UNION ALL
SELECT vpc.amp_activity_id, vpc.object_id AS funding_id, vpc.object_id AS amp_fund_detail_id, 11 AS transaction_type, (SELECT acv.id from amp_category_value acv JOIN amp_category_class acc ON acv.amp_category_class_id = acc.id WHERE acc.keyname='adjustment_type' and acv.category_value='Actual') AS adjustment_type, vpc.transaction_date AS transaction_date, vpc.transaction_amount AS transaction_amount, NULL as related_pledge_id, ac.amp_currency_id AS currency_id, NULL AS terms_assist_id, NULL AS fixed_exchange_rate, NULL AS financing_instrument_id, NULL AS donor_org_id, NULL AS mode_of_payment_id, NULL AS funding_status_id, NULL AS capital_spend_percent, NULL AS agreement_id, NULL AS disaster_response, NULL as recipient_org_id, NULL as recipient_role_id, (SELECT amp_role_id FROM amp_role WHERE role_code='DN'), NULL as expenditure_class_id, NULL as concessionality_level_id FROM v_proposed_cost vpc JOIN amp_currency ac ON ac.currency_code = vpc.currency_code
UNION ALL
SELECT f.amp_activity_id, f.amp_funding_id as funding_id, m.amp_fund_mtef_projection_id AS amp_fund_detail_id, 3 AS transaction_type, m.amp_projected_categoryvalue_id AS adjustment_type, m.projection_date AS transaction_date, m.amount AS transaction_amount, NULL AS related_pledge_id, m.amp_currency_id AS currency_id, f.type_of_assistance_category_va AS terms_assist_id, NULL AS fixed_exchange_rate, f.financing_instr_category_value AS financing_instrument_id, f.amp_donor_org_id AS donor_org_id, f.mode_of_payment_category_va AS mode_of_payment_id, f.funding_status_category_va AS funding_status_id, NULL as capital_spend_percent, f.agreement AS agreement_id, NULL AS disaster_response_code, m.recipient_org_id AS recipient_org_id, m.recipient_role_id AS recipient_role_id, f.source_role_id AS source_role_id, NULL AS expenditure_class_id, f.concessionality_level_va AS concessionality_level_id FROM amp_funding f JOIN amp_funding_mtef_projection m ON m.amp_funding_id = f.amp_funding_id;
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_ni_donor_funding_debug; CREATE VIEW v_ni_donor_funding_debug AS SELECT vdf.amp_activity_id, aa.name AS activity_name, vdf.funding_id, vdf.amp_fund_detail_id, vdf.transaction_type, vdf.adjustment_type, adjtype.category_value AS adjustment_type_name, vdf.transaction_date, vdf.transaction_amount, vdf.related_pledge_id, pledge.title AS pledge_title, vdf.currency_id, currency.currency_name AS currency_name, vdf.terms_assist_id, toa.category_value AS terms_assist_name, vdf.fixed_exchange_rate, vdf.financing_instrument_id, fininstr.category_value AS financing_instrument_name, vdf.donor_org_id, donor.name AS donor_org_name, donor_group.amp_org_grp_id AS donor_grp_id, donor_group.org_grp_name AS donor_grp_name, donor_type.amp_org_type_id AS donor_type_id, donor_type.org_type AS donor_type_name, vdf.mode_of_payment_id, mop.category_value AS mode_of_payment_name, vdf.funding_status_id, fs.category_value AS funding_status_name, vdf.capital_spend_percent, vdf.agreement_id, agr.title AS agreement_title, vdf.disaster_response_code, vdf.recipient_org_id, recipient.name AS recipient_org_name, vdf.recipient_role_id, recipient_role.name AS recipient_role_name, vdf.source_role_id, source_role.name AS source_role_name, vdf.expenditure_class_id, ec.category_value AS expenditure_class_name, vdf.concessionality_level_id, cl.category_value AS concessionality_level_name
FROM v_ni_donor_funding vdf JOIN amp_activity_version aa ON aa.amp_activity_id = vdf.amp_activity_id LEFT JOIN amp_category_value adjtype ON adjtype.id = vdf.adjustment_type LEFT JOIN v_pledges_titles pledge ON pledge.pledge_id = vdf.related_pledge_id LEFT JOIN amp_currency currency ON currency.amp_currency_id = vdf.currency_id LEFT JOIN amp_category_value toa ON toa.id = vdf.terms_assist_id LEFT JOIN amp_category_value fininstr ON fininstr.id = vdf.financing_instrument_id LEFT JOIN amp_organisation donor ON donor.amp_org_id = vdf.donor_org_id LEFT JOIN amp_org_group donor_group ON donor_group.amp_org_grp_id = donor.org_grp_id LEFT JOIN amp_org_type donor_type ON donor_type.amp_org_type_id = donor_group.org_type LEFT JOIN amp_category_value mop ON mop.id = vdf.mode_of_payment_id LEFT JOIN amp_category_value fs ON fs.id = vdf.funding_status_id LEFT JOIN amp_agreement agr ON agr.id = vdf.agreement_id LEFT JOIN amp_organisation recipient ON recipient.amp_org_id = vdf.recipient_org_id LEFT JOIN amp_role recipient_role ON recipient_role.amp_role_id = vdf.recipient_role_id LEFT JOIN amp_role source_role ON source_role.amp_role_id = vdf.source_role_id LEFT JOIN amp_category_value ec ON ec.id = vdf.expenditure_class_id LEFT JOIN amp_category_value cl ON cl.id = vdf.concessionality_level_id
ORDER BY amp_activity_id;
